steps.title: Student Gradebook
steps.body: See the percentage of questions that students get correct and how many assignments they’ve completed here.

steps.title: See student progress on a reading
steps.body: Once students have completed assignments, see student progress on a reading assignment and the student view of the assignment by hovering over a pie chart and clicking “review.”

steps.title: See student progress on a homework
steps.body: Once students have completed assignments, see student progress on a homework assignment and the student view of the assignment by clicking a student’s score.

steps.title: Export Gradebook
steps.body: Download an Excel document containing student scores for easy upload into your learning management system. [Coming soon: LMS integration.]
